message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, I'll try to negotiate from here!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much. Let's meet in the middle!
You're not moving much, I'll try to push for more!
I'm willing to give a bit more, but I still want to keep some buffer. Let's try to find a sweet spot!
You're not budging, I'll try to make a stronger move!
I'm willing to give a bit more, but I'm not going to give in entirely. Let's try to find a compromise that works for both of us!
